comment.body:
Реклама блокируется корректно. Вероятно что-то не так с HTTPS фильтрацией. Какой сертификат показывается в браузере? Его можно посмотреть через настройки в адресной строке. Также проверить работу программы можно [здесь](https://adguard.com/test.html).
Можете также попробовать переустановить сертификат в настройках программы, проверить, что для `Chrome` выставлены настройки фильтрации в приложениях и также оставить только эти фильтры на время проверки.
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Mobile Ads
AdGuard URL Tracking
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Social Media
AdGuard Cookie Notices
AdGuard Popups
AdGuard Mobile App Banners
AdGuard Other Annoyances
AdGuard Widgets
AdGuard Russian
```

comment.body:
Hi
Press on the 🛡️ icon at the bottom => `Safari protection` => `User rules`
You may add following rules to block twitter
```
||twitter.com^
||x.com^
```

issue.title: Tower of Fantasy (windows game)

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.19.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tof.pwrd.co.kr/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Install the Tower of Fantasy game and add WmgpMobileGame.exe to https filtering. And when I run the game and log in, I can't log in with an error as shown in the picture below.

`@@||mapi.perfectworldgames.com/c/api/user/token/login$stealth=xclientdata`
The above rule solves the problem. Please reflect it in the filter.

2. Screenshots
